okay  when I was seventeen years old after I'd gra graduated from high school
I went to Anaheim for a week long conference
and while I was there I developed meningitis
and uh I couldn't lay my head down on the pillow
it  it  it was excruciating
you_know  the  my scalp is very sensitive so I couldn't lay my head down on anything
I really didn't know what was wrong with me
I just thought I had a bad headache
so  I went out to the kitchen and uh just sat there for about an hour or two
it was the middle of the night and uh didn't really know what to do because I couldn't lay my head down
but I was exhausted
and uh so I ended up um going
and uh there was someone staying in the room with me
I  I told them that I couldn't sleep
something was wrong with my head
and uh he was actually a neurologist
uh but uh he ended up giving me some pretty strong uh um pills to help the pain go away
and it helped through the morning
but then the next day it continued to hurt
so  uh I ended up going to the hospital that evening
I was actually staying with three doctors
so  they took me to the the hospital
and uh they checked me in
they did a  um first did a elec
let's see what was it
a cat
think it was a cat
uh um and if I had a tumor or anything near the spinal column that could paralyze me
uh so  that was fine so they ended up performing the lumbar puncture
a  it was a  it was a resident it was a teaching uh hospital it was U_C_Irvine
and uh he didn't do a very good job at it
so  the the doctor was watching him took over
it was painful
but they had given me morphine by this point
so  I felt much better
uh I felt great actually really warm and fuzzy inside
and uh I was still in the emergency room at that point
and eventually the next morning got me into my own room
and uh I felt fine by the next day
um but they didn't think I was doing well because I wasn't eating that much
but when I was seventeen I was only eating uh one meal a day
but they said I they would let me go home if I didn't eat more
so  I hadta eat three meals a day
and they wanted to monitor me
and but I felt great
and I thought it was ridiculous that they kept me there
and they kept me two more days
and uh they performed another lumbar puncture before they would let me go
and to check my white blood cell count
and it was pretty much the same as it was before
so  it didn't show much of an improvement
but I felt great
so  they let me go home

my niece and my  one of my nieces one of my nephews had a speech delay
it was  it was mainly with phonation
just problems with  uh mainly with uh
let's see  what was it
I think it was the sl hl sound
and um I think both of them had that same problem and a couple of others you_know problems with uh liquids
but that's not a big problem
you_know  you develop later
um I  I actually did work with one of my nieces in regards to that
she was very responsive
um but uh it  it wasn't that big of a difficulty
you_know  we could just  I could still understand her for the most part
wasn't a big problem
is there anything else I should tell you about

I was going to go visit my great uncle my mom's uncle in Iowa
and I was with my sister
we were taking the Greyhound um from Nebraska up to Iowa
and we were there at one of the Greyhound stations
and my sister wanted to go to grab a bite to eat while it was  uh it was a rest stop there and uh she wanted to go grab a bite to eat
the bus driver said to hurry
and he ended up leaving without us
and we were stuck in some place
I had no clue where we were
I was only nine
and uh I was very scared
and uh we tried to chase after the bus
and it wouldn't stop
and uh my sister was kind_of panicking
she was like fourteen or fifteen and I was nine
but uh then my uh my my great aunt pulled up like right then
she was worried
she hadn't seen us yet
so  and it was only like ten minutes later
so  I was fine

one day a girl decided to go on hike through a riverbed which was very dry at that time as it was Arizona
then there happened to be a flash flood
and as she walked  she was walking this flood roared down through the riverbed and caught her
and she incapable of you_know swimming to the shore or anything
and she was uh panicking and was very frightened and didn't know what to do
eventually she  the  the  the  um the  the water brought her to a tree limb where she was able to grab on
and uh she was screaming for help
and uh some people nearby heard her and called nineoneone for a rescue team to come and fetch her out_of the water
and uh a little while later they arrived
and um the man was wearing a vest
and he was tied on to the tree limb
and he had uh a belt attached to her
and he climbed down the tree limb attached her to the belt and pulled her out to safety
and she knew not to walk in riverbeds before flash floods

one day Tommy decided to go play soccer out in the field uh behind his house
and um he tried to kick the ball as hard as he could
and the ball flew very far right through his living room window where his dad was sitting watching television
the ball went through the window and also broke the lamp
the father picked up the ball looked out the window and saw his son
the father called the boy in and grounded him for a week
one day Tommy was preparing to go to school
the mother said it was going to rain that day and insisted that he take an umbrella
Tommy said
no umbrellas are for sissies
and uh he left
the mother was not happy
but he left anyways
on his way to school it began to pour down so much that he hadta run home to get that umbrella
when he arrived at home he was sopping wet
and his mother scolded him for not taking her advice in the first place
then Tommy took the umbrella and walked back to school
Cinderella was a little girl
her mother had passed away
and her father uh ended up remarrying a woman who had two daughters
uh the  this woman and her two daughters
well  eventually Cinderella's father also passed away
and she was left with her stepsisters and stepmother
her stepmother and stepsisters were very cruel to her and made her um their servant basically
and uh everyone  they were very cruel to her
and she lived a very um meager life
and um but she was f friends with all the animals
uh the animals were the people she got along with people she could talk to or  the  the creatures that she could talk to
and uh then one day the there was a prince in that um country
and uh they were gonna hold a ball for him to find his wife
and  uh as it was time for him to marry
and all  and Cinderella and their  her stepsisters were very excited to go
uh however Cinderella uh could not go unless she had finished all her chores
her stepmother gave her tons and tons of chores to accomplish
and she said Cinderella could only go if she finished all her chores first
um so  um by the time uh it came to go um Cinderella had just finished her chores and had no time to um make a dress or prepare herself to go

but uh unbeknownst to her her animals friends had prepared a dress for her while she was doing her chores using fragments of her stepsisters' clothes and such that uh they had cast away because they didn't want it
um so  Cinderella was very happy um that they had the dress for her
and sh while the  the stepmother and the stepsisters did not expect her to be able to make it um Cinderella came rushing down the stairs wearing her new dress very happy to go
then the stepsisters began to realize that her dress was composed of things they had cast away
and um they started tearing all the pieces of the dress that belonged to them until Cinderella was left in nothing but tatters
and she went out to the yard and was crying
and then uh a fairy godmother appeared and put a spell on her that would last until midnight
she made her very beautiful and uh all that
but she warned her
it would only last til midnight
and you_know she turned you_know uh a pumpkin into a carriage and you_know transformed all these elements uh to make her look very beautiful
and so Cinderella raced off to the ball where she met the prince
and uh I guess it was love at first sight
and they were dancing together
and you_know he he very much enjoyed his time with her
and uh they were dancing outside
and she saw the clock
and she knows it's almost midnight so she went racing down the stairs uh leaving one of her glass slippers behind um
and she went racing off in the carriage
and um she actually didn't make it quite home in the when it struck midnight
and everything turned back to what it was pumpkin
the carriage turned back into a pumpkin
and everything went back to the way it was except for one of her glass slippers
and so this prince um after this happened he uh was very interested in finding her
you_know  he was  wo he wondered why she had ran away
and so he um set out to search for her using the glass slipper
you_know  whoever's foot it fit would be that girl
he sent out his  um I don't know it was the duke or something uh to find the girl whose foot the slipper would fit
it was very small
um and eventually that duke got to Cinderella's house
and uh Cinderella got excited
but the stepmother knew why she was there and locked Cinderella up in the room as somehow she figured out it was Cinderella
I don't remember how
and um locked Cinderella up there
and  um while her stepsisters tried on the glass slipper
their feet were way too large
they went flying you_know every time
and uh the animals ended up helping Cinderella by fetching the key from the  the stepmother to open the door that she was locked behind
and she came downstairs to try on the glass slipper
the stepmother was very angry at this
and the duke began to walk over towards Cinderella with the glass slipper
and uh the stepmother tripped him
and the glass slipper went flying into the air and fell on the ground and crushed into a million pieces
and you_know the duke thought that everything was over
and everything was ruined
and they'd never find her
but just at that moment she Cinderella produced the other glass slipper and revealed her identity
and she ended up marrying the prince
and they lived happily ever after
